text: Bob's Full House is a British quiz programme hosted by Bob Monkhouse which was based on the popular game 'Bingo' and aired on BBC One from 1 September 1984 until 27 January 1990. Category:1984 television series debuts Category:1990 television series endings Category:1980s British television series Category:1990s British television series endings Category:BBC Television programmes Category:British television game shows
title: Bob's Full House
